title: New: .JONES. – Deep
body:
Already cropping up in ALL the right places (shout out [P&P](http://pigeonsandplanes.

com/2014/09/premiere-jones-deep/)), Deep, the alluring debut from Londoner **.JONES.** marks her out as an early name to watch out for in 2015. Immediate comparisons will undoubtedly be drawn to the likes of Mapei and Solange, yet there’s a chart instinct in, not quite found yet in either of the aforementioned. Check out _Deep_ below.
